Sudoku Reader Module

class tests.test_sudoku_reader.TestSudokuReader(methodName='runTest')[source]

Test cases for the SudokuReader class

The SudokuReader class is responsible for reading a sudoku board for a given file.

These tests ensure the class handles various file input scenarios correctly.

test_non_existent_file()[source]

Test that the SudokuReader class raises a RuntimeError when the file does not exist

test_not_a_text_file()[source]

Test that the SudokuReader class raises a RuntimeError when the file is not a text file

test_solve_sudoku_empty_text_file()[source]

Test that the SudokuReader class raises a ValueError when the file is empty
